deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - March 5 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: HARD WATER? NO PROBLEM: 9 Elements helps purify fabrics from hard water metals and trapped odors. Use with your laundry detergent to soften fabrics and restore colors
VINEGAR-POWERED: Strips away trapped residues and odors with the purifying power of vinegar with no vinegar odor left behind
NEVER MORE THAN 9 INGREDIENTS: We use only the necessary ingredients. Our formula has no artificial preservatives, dyes, thickeners, or brighteners and is gentle on sensitive skin
THE EPA SAFER CHOICE LABEL helps you select products to protect your famiy and the Environment
LIGHT & REFRESHING LEMON SCENT: Made with 100% Lemon Essential Oil for a refreshing citrus scent
ALSO TRY: Other 9 Elements vinegar-powered products in your laundry room, kitchen, and bathroom
Buy 9 Elements worry-free. If you're not completely satisfied, check out our money-back guarantee
body.description: 9 Elements Purifying Softener purifies fabrics from hard water metals and trapped odors to solve issues like fading and fabric stiffness - like a detox for your clothes. Rejuvenate your clothes so your darks stay dark, your colors stay vibrant, and your whites stay white. Your fabrics will feel soft and fresh with the light, refreshing scent of Lemon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff works!
reviews.reviewText: Ya'll I live in the county and we have well water, which is known to have the hardest water in my state. The water is so hard that it causes our dishwasher and laundry machine to break down faster. Needing a laundry soap that is built to handle hard water is crucial, otherwise your clothes do not get clean and you can feel a residue on them. I bought the dish washing spray when it was on sale at my HEB and it worked great. I bought the dish soap to use outside to wash my chicken feeders-as it's eco friendly and we do have a well. It cleaned scum off those feeders fabulously to my surprise. Was not so eager to try it on my dishes, I thought green meant it does not clean as well. We ended up changing our lifestyle later on and introducing clean products and I found out this was one of the FEW clean laundry soaps out there and when I found out it was designed for hard water-I had to try it out. The price was right, much cheaper than tide and for having clean ingredients-this price is a score.I did not have to use as much cleaner, I noticed after the first load. I put it to the third line and it did not rinse, then I used less (1st line) and not only was there no residue, it was clean and my clothes smelled so clean, the scent was not overpowering. It smelled like how your clothes smell fresh from drying in the sun on a line. My clothes have not felt this clean in awhile. It got out stains and it was gentle on our clothes and bedding. I went and made another purchase three days after purchasing my first, incase the price go's up-it usually does when people find out how good something is.With all the crap in everything now days, it's terrible to walk around in clothes washed in toxic chemicals that cause everything from infertility, hormonal problems to cancer and people are none the wiser. Your body is against these chemicals all day and your skin is just soaking them up and people wonder why they are getting sick. It is wonderful that we now have options instead of using only what was once available at the time. I would highly recommend this product, not only for the cleaning power and how well it tackles hard water, but for the health of you and your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CLEANS GREAT... Pleasant, Yet NOT Overpowering Scent
reviews.reviewText: I was using another readily available brand of BLUE dish cleaning spray because I liked the novel manner of dispersing a spray onto heavily soiled pots, pans, and baking dishes, thus softening/dissolving stubborn stuck-on foods. YES, the popular blue brand stuff worked great in that it provided easier cleaning, HOWEVER it also emitted a heavy, chemical scent that was negatively affecting my breathing (not to mention the high cost that negatively affected my budget).It was about then that I noticed that the water spots left behind by our well water were positively affected by the use of common household vinegar. The bad news is that vinegar, in an of itself has it's own profound, pungent, and lingering smell. Then, while perusing AMAZON's website, I happened to spy this 9 ELEMENTS VINEGAR LEMON DISH DETERGENT SPRAY. I purchased the 4 bottle/refill configuration and found myself thrilled with the results. The spray function worked well. It clung to and removed sticky foods from various forms of cookware - and did so WITHOUT ANY overwhelming chemical smell. In fact, with the addition of lemon to the cleanser, I couldn't detect ANY vinegar smell at all during use. Our experience showed it was not only effective in cleaning heavy soil from dishes, pots, and baking dishes, but it was also exceptionally effective in cleaning our glass cooktop, countertops, stainless steel appliances, vent hood, and just about ANY other mess I could throw at it. I was so impressed, I just purchased the 9 ELEMENTS LIQUID DISH SOAP. (I'll let you know HOW THAT'S working out as soon as I've tried it.)YES, YES, YES, I am happy to recommend this 9 ELEMENTS SPRAY DISH SOAP (available on auto ship with AMAZON as well as local availability at Harris Teeter markets.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shipping is horrible
reviews.reviewText: I really like this detergent I’m not allergic to the mild smell like I am to 99% of retail detergents it cleans very well and is efficientBut it’s always damaged and leaking when shipped through Amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lifesaver for calcium-hard water
reviews.reviewText: After moving to an area with super hard water, tons of calcium, which builds up on your skin and your hair, and in your fabrics. After just one wash with this laundry detergent, I had soft – not scratchy – sheets and clothing again. It’s really nothing fun about sleeping on scratchy sheets, or having cotton sweaters that itch and won’t stretch. So this was really needed, and it really works. A small amount – about 3/4 of an inch in the big cup – is enough for one normal load, in a normal household size washing machine. So it will be pretty cost-effective, it solves the problem, and I always want to use ecology, friendly products, which this is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love product but leaked everywhere
reviews.reviewText: Love this product so much!However, the last time I ordered it one of the refill bottles busted open and soaked everything including the box it was shipped in. It created a huge mess and Amazon won’t let me return it per its policy. Requesting a replacement required me contacting 9 Elements via phone call and I don’t have the time to be on the phone for possible hours for one replacement bottle.As I said, love their product but I won’t use Amazon anymore to order it (which is sad because they have good deals!).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We like this product...wsh the spray was adjustable
reviews.reviewText: It's great using a product with limited ingredients we can actually spell. Vinegar is a wonderful cleaning solution and spray bottle works perfectly every time. It would just be nice if they had a 'stream' option and the 'spray'...but it's a great product.
Llevo años comprando detergentes menos tóxicos y este me pareció buena opción, le dio alergia a mi niño :(
